pages.text: $(mana)Mana$() is the magical energy that powers all Aster Risk equipment and machines.$(br2)Every player has a mana pool (shown in the HUD) that regenerates over time. The regeneration rate depends on the $(l)Moon Phase$():$(br2)$(li)$(l)Full Moon$(): 2x regeneration$(li)$(l)New Moon$(): 0.5x regeneration$(li)$(l)Other phases$(): Normal rate

pages.title: Mana Usage
pages.text: Mana is consumed by:$(br2)$(li)Magical wands and staves$(li)Lunar Infuser operations$(li)Ritual crafting at Altar Core$(li)Special armor abilities$(br2)Keep an eye on your mana bar before engaging in combat with magical weapons!
